oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photomontage of actors, Christmas decorations at the Tarbox School in Nashville, babies and children of Tennessee families, and five ads, one of which features a local child. 16 x 21.5 in. Forms part of the Nashville Newspaper Rotogravure Digital Images Collection.
